response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to us. However, considering its significance to you, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving for you, while still allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
